function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater treatment plant (WWTP) inflow","Impact":"Potential for spread of the virus through the wastewater system","Mitigation":"Improved detection methods and robust standard protocols for clean-up and measurements","Technologies":"Advanced SARS-CoV-2 detection and monitoring technologies","People":"People living in catchment areas of the WWTP","Owner":"WWTP operators and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Unspecific signal in RT-qPCR testing","Impact":"Risk of false-positive results for SARS-CoV-2 detection","Mitigation":"Confirmation of positive RT-qPCR results by sequencing or other appropriate techniques","Technologies":"Sanger sequencing and other confirmation techniques","People":"Laboratory technicians performing RT-qPCR testing","Owner":"Laboratories and health research institutions"},{"Description":"Poor removal of SARS-CoV-2 in conventional activated-sludge WWTP","Impact":"Potential for SARS-CoV-2 fragments to remain in the effluent","Mitigation":"Exploration of alternative treatment methods like ozonation and membrane-based WWTP","Technologies":"Ozonation and membrane-based wastewater treatment technologies","People":"People using water downstream of WWTP","Owner":"WWTP managers and engineers"}]}
